file_content.text: House Organa's given us their full support. We can't ask for more than that.
Even the Jedi couldn't predict the Sacking. The Republic's changed. We need Alderaan back.
My men are dying for House Organa, Senator. I need something more definite than "maybe."
Or you'll leave Alderaan to Bouris Ulgo? If your men won a few more battles, it might help.
For a world that isn't sure about the Republic? I'll be sure to pass that along.
